summary: The diff only shows frontend logic changes (React Query authentication gating and an admin page auth/admin-check flow). It does not show addition of the required static brand image files, and there are no new asset files added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the required static brand images exist as generated assets and are available from the frontend without routing through the backend, using the exact filenames specified (fantasyxi-logo.dim_512x512.png and fantasyxi-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png under frontend/public/assets/generated).
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff, and there is no evidence of the required PNG assets being created under frontend/public/assets/generated or referenced as static public assets.
evidence: Modified files list contains no frontend/public/assets/generated entries
